Road Closure on Ticehurst Road between 7 and 11 Ticehurst Road to allow for a Retaining wall to be rebuilt. The road will be required to be permanently closed from 7AM Tuesday 27 October to 6PM 18 December 2015. This is to allow various works to be undertaken for the rebuild such as site drilling, site excavation, hiab materials onto site,Scaffold/platform installation and removal, concreting works, as well as a safety area in the event of collapse of materials onto the roadway
